Vocab 1

Nemi'gig gitpu'g alaqsultijig musigisg'tug.

I see eagles flying around in the sky.

Nemi'gig paqt'smug pemtugul'tijig sipug.

I see wolves running along the river.

Nemi'gig mimigesg alaqsultijig musigisg'tug.

I see butterflies flying around in the sky.

Nemi'gig wowgwisg al'tugultijig awtigtug.

I see foxes running around in the road.

Nemi'gig tia'mug alo'ltijig qospemg.

I see moose hanging around at the lake.

Nemi'gig te'pljig al-mila'taqa'tijig gujmug.

I see goats playing around/going around doing mischief outside.

Nutaqig wapusg ali-unaqjol'tijig 'msiguigtug.

I hear rabbits hopping around in the grass.

Nemi'gig apigjilu'g pisultjig tepaqanigtug.

I see skunks located in/underneath the car.

Nemi'gig go'gwe'ji'jg pemi-tqojuapegultijig miti'sigtug.

I see spiders climbing along up the tree.

Nemi'gig apigji'jg neii'pultijig, aq app aqui'pultijig.

I see mice zip out into view, and again zip out of view.

Nemi'gig gu'gu'gwesg alaqsultijig nipugtug.

I see two flying around in the woods.

Nemi'gig 'sqoljig ala'mu'tijig qospemg.

I see frogs swimming around in the lake.

Nemi'gig mui'naq alo'ltijig nipugtug.

I see bears hanging around in the woods.

Nutaqig mui'ne'jg al'-temultijig nipugtug.

I hear bear cubs going around crying in the woods.

Nemi'gig migjigjig ala'mu'tijig qospemg.

I see turtles swimming around in the lake.

Nutaqig ap'tapegiejijig etlatalultijig 'msiguigtug.

I see turkeys eating in the grass.

Nutaqig amaljugwejg metewo'ltijig gujmug.

I hear raccoons making a sound outside.

Nemi'gig gopitaq ala'mu'tijig samqwanigtug, gigjiw gun'tewigtug.

I see beavers swimming around in the water, near a rock.

Nutaqig apli'gmujg metewatalultijig iga'taqanigtug.

I hear rabbits eating (heard but not seen) in the garden.

  • ←Previous Dialog
  • Next Dialog→
